Pre-Game Insights: India has advanced out of the group stage in every ICC T20 World Cup.
Canada is competing in its first ICC T20 World Cup.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India has won the first ICC T20 World Cup back in 2007.
Canada has qualified for the main Cricket World Cup four times but has never advanced out of the group stage there either.
Others: The match between India and Canada takes place on Saturday, June 15, 2024 at 10:30 a.m. ET.
This cricket contest between India and Canada can be watched by Fubo subscribers on Willow TV.
